name: TAIMANIN RPG Extasy
description:
■Game Introduction

・Story
Taimanin―humans who could stand against the demonic forces, opposing the deviants' evil. These anti-demon ninja gather at Gosha Academy. There, the protagonist, who was born into the noble Fuma Head Family but cannot use Ninja Arts, was enjoying his carefree school life. However, one day the academy is raided, and his destiny is violently set in motion. He is then appointed as the captain of an independent commando unit by Headmistress Igawa Asagi, and, together with his new companions, he sets out to pursue the truth of the incident!

・Campaign Rewards
Play Taimanin RPGX Extasy and get 1800 Taima Crystals in total with the Registration Limited Login Bonus! Also, receive SR [Igawa Asagi] on the 7th login day!

・VIP System
A system in which helpful in-game features can be unlocked by earning points via logging in, spending in-game currency, and more. The higher your VIP Rank, the more rewards can be earned.

・Battle Pass
There are two versions of the Battle Pass, the "Free Battle Pass" for all players, and the "Premium Battle Pass" for those who have purchased it. The Premium Battle Pass offers more extensive rewards, such as Taima Crystals and Premium Tickets.


■How to Play

・Battles
Manually control your Units or select Auto-Battle! Take down tough enemies by manually choosing targets and utilizing items. Furthermore, the Auto-Rematch function can be unlocked after clearing certain conditions. Use it to earn tons of items, equipment, XP, and Unit Trust!

・Leveling
Enhance your Units and customize their equipment and formations to your liking. Set a party that can take advantage of the attributes of the enemies!
